message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you is $12,000.
Alice, $18,000 is a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $13,500. This is a fair price considering its value to you and my budget. Let's make a deal!

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $13,500 is a bit lower than my initial price, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $16,000. This is still a great deal considering its value to you is $12,000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14,500.  This is a fair price considering its value to both of us and I believe it will allow us to reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand that $14,500 is a bit lower than my previous offer, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $15,750. This is a fair price considering its value to you and I think it's a good compromise.
